document_data.mainbody:
he Conjuring of the Second Moon was a sacred ritual performed by followers of Sel没ne, the Night White Lady.
The Conjuring of the Second Moon was observed by Sel没nites on Shieldmeet. Shards were summoned to serve the Sel没nites, which usually involved doing battle with minions of vile Shar. In return for their service, the Shards took one of the female Sel没nites to become one of them when they departed.
